alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:46PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Gusty winds, blowing dust and fire weather concerns Thursday through Saturday... An upper-level low will bring impacts across the region through the weekend. Out ahead of the low, temperatures will warm and winds will increase. This will lead to elevated fire weather conditions Thursday through Saturday. Red Flag Warnings are in effect for Thursday and Friday and a Fire Weather Watch is in effect for Saturday. In addition, blowing dust is likely at times and could significantly reduce visibility. Winds look to be quite strong on Friday, and a High Wind Watch is in effect. For Sunday, cooler temps and lighter winds expected. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
